fields.title: New website!
fields.content:
Hey everyone! Welcome to the launch of the Gift-Shack website! The store is now filled with brand new gifts and products featuring our unique designs. There will also be new artwork to follow very shortly so please be patient and I'll post again as soon as it's all complete. Should only be a few days now! 

Lots more product lines are planned for the summer including original paintings, prints, posters, t-shirts and all manner of abstract joy! Stay with us and we'll dazzle you with lots of beautiful things in the months to come.

fields.title: Trade Customers Discount
fields.content:
Great news good people! We now offer a simple 20% discount off our RRP to trade customers who would like to buy for their business. This discount applies to your entire order whether you purchase a single item or a whole range of products!

We currently supply Interior Designers, Gift Shops and Home Interiors stores.

You can register as a trade customer by creating an account at the top of the home page.

fields.title: Greetings Cards
fields.content:
Check out the latest additions to our greetings cards range in our Gifts section. Bright, bold, colourful illustrations and all unique to Gift-Shack. 

Let me know what you think, hope you like them!

fields.name: John Smith
fields.body: Loving the new cards, beautiful colours!

fields.name: Richy Rich
fields.body: Great news, I'll sign up asap and get browsing for my interior design business.

fields.name: test
fields.body: Awesome new site Gift Shack, can't wait to see all the new stuff!
